name: Island Sun - Handcrafted Soap
description: Let a little Island Sun brighten your day! The fragrance combines fruit and citrus, with just a touch of floral notes. Our luxurious shea & cocoa butter soap will nourish and pamper your skin. All of our bars are hand-crafted in small batches using only the finest quality ingredients. Every bar is hand-trimmed and cured for at least 4 weeks before it is ready for sale. This is Cold Process soap made from scratch—NOT a melt & pour base. NOTE: We also offer lotions, scrubs, bath bombs, and body butters in this fragrance. Contact us for details. This bar weighs at least 4.5 oz. (most are 5 oz., or slightly larger) and contains: Water, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Ricinus Communus (Castor) Seed Oil, Fragrance, D&C Yellow #11, D&C Red #17, D&C Green #6

name: Orange Spice - Handcrafted Soap
description: A subtle spicy fragrance, topped off with scent of orange peel. This soap is colored using real orange peel powder, which is rich in Vitamin C and fruit acids. Our luxurious shea & cocoa butter soap will nourish and pamper your skin. All of our bars are hand-crafted in small batches using only the finest quality ingredients. Every bar is hand-trimmed and cured for at least 4 weeks before it is ready for sale. This is Cold Process soap made from scratch—NOT a melt & pour base. NOTE: Other fragrances available! Contact us for more information. This bar weighs at least 4.5 oz. (most are 5 oz., or slightly larger) and contains: Water, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Ricinus Communus (Castor) Seed Oil, Fragrance Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Powder

name: Honeysuckle Hollow - Handcrafted Soap
description: If you’ve ever taken a walk in the country, you’ll recognize the beautiful scent of honeysuckle. This one smells so good that we’ve even started making incense in this fragrance—convo us if you would like to order some. Our luxurious shea & cocoa butter soap will nourish and pamper your skin. All of our bars are hand-crafted in small batches using only the finest quality ingredients. Every bar is hand-trimmed and cured for at least 4 weeks before it is ready for sale. name: Shenandoah Sunset - Handcrafted Soap
description: Escape to the beautiful Shenandoah Valley! We’re in apple-growing country, and this fragrance captures it by combining woods and apple notes, with just a hint of lavender. This is a great unisex scent, and the guys will love it. Our luxurious shea & cocoa butter soap will nourish and pamper your skin. All of our bars are hand-crafted in small batches using only the finest quality ingredients. Every bar is hand-trimmed and cured for at least 4 weeks before it is ready for sale. This is Cold Process soap made from scratch—NOT a melt & pour base. NOTE: We also offer lotions, scrubs, bath bombs, and body butters in this fragrance. Contact us for details. This bar weighs at least 4.5 oz. (most are 5 oz., or slightly larger) and contains: Water, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Ricinus Communus (Castor) Seed Oil, Fragrance, D&C Green #6, D&C Yellow #11, D&C Red #17

name: Summer Rose - Handcrafted Soap
description: The classic fragrance of rose, captured in a skin-nourishing soap. This rose is not too sweet or perfumed; it’s just right. Our luxurious shea & cocoa butter soap will nourish and pamper your skin. All of our bars are hand-crafted in small batches using only the finest quality ingredients. Every bar is hand-trimmed and cured for at least 4 weeks before it is ready for sale. This is Cold Process soap made from scratch—NOT a melt & pour base.
